page.title: 08Schools in Westhill.
page.content:
{Crombie Primary}:Boys Brigade,Brownies Communion and Creche,Christian Fellowship, Family Service and Sunday school, Friday Club, Guides, Keep Fit {Westhill Primary}: Adult Badminton,A.T.C.,Badminton, Bible Classes,Brownies,Carpet Bowlers, Girls club,Guides,Junior Youth Club, Rangers,R.C.Church,Teen Challenge. Crombie Primary was opened in 1977.It has 348 pupils and fifteen teachers.
Westhill Primary was opened in August 1974 with 13 teachers and 344 pupils {Westhill Academy}:Opened August 1979 49 Teachers and 590 pupils:there are 12 subjects taught in half day blocks. Pupils are involved in school decision making and have been responsible for a number of important changes.Corporal punishment has never existed in school
